location: Level 2 Corporate Boardroom and Level 8 Jade District

knows: Has spent 32 million credits in 3 years

Nico Chen.emotional_state: Terrified of responsibility, exhausted, torn between immediate help and long-term sustainability, defensive when challenged
Nico Chen.physical_state: Still using Veil regularly but reduced from previous levels, hands shake without morning hit, functional addict
Nico Chen.current_resources: 16 million credits, multiple buildings, clinic, restaurants, community center
Nico Chen.relationships_changed: Maya quit her social services job 6 months ago to work with him full-time, relationship deepening
Nico Chen.key_realization: He's playing god with people's lives and doesn't know how to stop
Nico Chen.status: Universally called 'Uncle Nico' or 'The King', beloved in Level 8, under corporate surveillance

knows: Current spending is unsustainable
They're treating symptoms not disease
The system that creates poverty is still intact
Nico is destroying himself trying to save everyone
There are 53 families on housing waiting list
The operation will collapse eventually
Maya Torres.emotional_state: Loving but frustrated, trying to be the voice of reason, worried about Nico's health and the operation's future
Maya Torres.location: Level 8, working full-time for Nico's operation
Maya Torres.status: Quit social services job 6 months ago, still wears old ID badge, fully committed to helping but questions methods
Maya Torres.role: Manages housing placements and tries to push Nico toward systemic thinking

knows: Money is running out faster than Nico admits
Maya is right about sustainability
Nico won't change approach despite logic
They're both still addicts, just more functional
The operation has become too big to fail gracefully
Kade Rivera.emotional_state: Darkly amused, loyal, in chronic pain, clear-eyed about eventual collapse
Kade Rivera.physical_state: Reduced Veil use but still using, body hurts constantly, wakes up screaming twice a week, careful movements
Kade Rivera.status: Nico's closest advisor and friend, helps manage operations
Kade Rivera.commitment: In it till the end, whatever that looks like

knows: The system doesn't change fundamentally
Temporary good is still good
Nico is doing genuine good despite imperfections
Revolution is idealistic but people need immediate help
Wright is a class traitor who sold his soul
Lin Zhao.emotional_state: Pragmatic, supportive, serves as Nico's conscience and defender
Lin Zhao.location: Level 8, frequent visitor to senior center
Lin Zhao.role: Community elder, voice of pragmatic support, counters Maya's idealism with survivalist wisdom

knows: Chen has spent millions over 3 years
Labor participation in levels 7-9 down 18%
Has legal file thick enough to act
Corporate Council hasn't authorized arrest
Collapse will cause riots when it comes

Commander James Wright.emotional_state: Patient, calculating, believes he's right about temporary help being harmful
Commander James Wright.status: Continuing surveillance, building case, waiting for Council authorization
Commander James Wright.philosophy: Letting Nico build higher before the fall will make the crash worse

knows: Labor participation down 18% in 36 months
Nico Chen spending 2 million credits annually
Correlation between his charity and labor decline
Documentation appears legally sound
Arresting him would cause riots
Economic calculation for workers has changed
Corporate Council.emotional_state: Frustrated, concerned about labor crisis, cautious about acting
Corporate Council.strategy: PR campaign to shift public perception, bureaucratic harassment, wait for right moment to shut down operation
Corporate Council.threat_level: High - viewing Nico as systemic threat to tier structure

revealed_to_reader: Three years have passed since Book 1 ending
Nico has spent 32 million of original 50 million credits
16 million credits remaining, approximately 4 years left
Current spending: 165k per week (Clinic 60k, Housing 45k, Food lower due to scale)
Labor participation in lower tiers down 18% - correlated directly with Nico's charity
Corporate Council is actively strategizing against Nico
Plan includes PR campaign to paint him as warlord, bureaucratic harassment
Wright has thick legal file but no authorization to act yet
Maya quit social services job 6 months ago
Operation now includes: restaurants, clinic, housing subsidies, community center, youth programs, elder care
Level 8 Jade District transformed: lights work, trash collected, air recyclers function
Nico and Kade both reduced Veil use but still regularly using
Nico is universally beloved in Level 8, called 'Uncle Nico' or 'The King'
Maya and Nico are together, but she's pushing him to think systemically
Lin Zhao believes temporary good is still worthwhile
Council recognizes workers making rational economic choices to refuse degrading labor

planted.significance: But spending will accelerate, depleting faster

active_tensions: Money running out faster than Nico admits
Maya vs Nico on immediate help vs systemic change
Corporate Council planning to destroy the operation
Wright waiting with thick legal file for authorization
Nico's terror of being responsible for thousands
Demand for services growing faster than resources
Public opinion can be manipulated against Nico
world_changes: Level 8 Jade District transformed into quasi-utopia
Labor participation in levels 7-9 down 18% over 36 months
Corporate Council actively strategizing against Nico
Economic calculation for lower-tier workers has fundamentally changed
Nico's operation now serves thousands daily
Maya has left social services permanently
Wright has authorization to monitor but not act
Tier system showing first signs of destabilization
notes: First tentpole of Book 2. Three-year time jump establishes new status quo: Nico's operation is successful and transformative, but this success has made him a target. Corporate Council chapter shows the opposition organizing, framing the central conflict of Book 2. Key themes: temporary good vs systemic change, individual charity creating economic disruption, the burden of being needed by thousands. Character growth: Nico more exhausted and defensive, Maya more radical and committed, Kade more damaged, Lin pragmatically supportive, Wright patient and calculating. Sets up economic war between Nico and upper tiers. Money countdown begins in earnest. Arc position 0.55 for Nico - growth but also new problems emerging.
